A young man taking care of his dying mother is distraught and grief-stricken
when she finally passes away. On the advice of his doctor, he takes a job in
an upscale nursing home, and is assigned to take care of an elderly woman named
Esther.

At first Esther is a bitter, angry woman and pushes him away, but as she
gradually warms to him, he discovers that he and Esther have much more in
common than he imagined.

Enjoy the movie!
